title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a face in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a face in a dream. Interpretation of seeing an ugly and beautiful face. Interpretation of seeing a white, black, or brown face in a dream. Therefore, our task today will be to communicate and interpret these signs and symbols in an easy and simple way, where the reader can distinguish from today’s topic. Interpretation of any dream that appears in a dream of a person. What is intended to be mentioned is explained in this article. Interpretation of a dream about Ibn Sirin’s face. Seeing a beautiful face in a dream, as Ibn Sirin interpreted it, and exposing it indicates a high position in opinion. As for seeing an ugly face in a dream, it is evidence of an inappropriate attitude among people. Seeing hair on the face In strange places, it indicates fears and sorrows. As for seeing a disfigured face in a dream, it indicates future problems and difficulties for me. Seeing a white face in a dream. Seeing a beautiful face in a dream indicates good luck and happiness for the dreamer. Also, seeing a beautiful face in a dream is a sign of money. Or success or travel. To see the face of a beautiful woman shows me the world and the happiness and goodness in it. Seeing the faces of children in a dream indicates happiness and pleasure. Seeing the beautiful face of a dead person in a dream is a good word. A beautiful face in a dream also indicates parental approval. Seeing a beautiful face in a dream shows how wonderful the dreamer is in his pursuit of religion and the world. Interpretation of a dream about an ugly face: Seeing an ugly face in a dream is an unfortunate vision. Seeing the dreamer as if his face is ugly is a warning of bad consequences, so he must be aware of his actions and deeds. Seeing children with ugly faces, indicates a warning of sadness and bad news. Seeing a woman’s face ugly in a dream, which indicates the world and its fears, fatigue and hardships. Interpretation Dream of a brown face: Seeing a brown face in a dream means fame and power. As for seeing a black face in a dream, this indicates the mistakes of the owner of that face. Also, seeing a brown face in a dream is, for me, a sign of the coming of food and goodness. Interpretation of a dream about facial wrinkles: Seeing wrinkles on the face in a dream A praiseworthy vision for the dreamer, and it indicates years of misery, effort, and patience. Seeing facial wrinkles in a man’s dream means that he has a lot of money. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a facial mask in a dream. Seeing women's wrinkles in a dream. Seeing a distorted face in a dream. Seeing a distorted face in a dream indicates the persecution of others or the rise and fall of the dreamer in gossip, and seeing the distorted face of the dreamer shows that people are trying to seize him or undermine him. Name, status, and reputation. Not only is it worthy of praise to see a child’s distorted face foretelling the troubles and fears that will befall the pioneer, but also to see hatred for a dead face distorted in dreams, which indicates renewal and fascination. Other interpretations of seeing a face in a dream. Whoever sees that he has two faces in a dream, the His vision showed his bad outcome, saying: “God does not look at both sides.” And seeing faces could be a sign of apostasy - Sheikh Nabulsi. The face is sweating in a dream and seeing sweat on the face indicates shame and humiliation. A frowning face in a dream indicates sadness and may indicate associated hatred. In the opinion of a frowning person

In the opinion of a frowning person

title: Interpretation of seeing a prisoner in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a prisoner in a dream: Escaping from prison means enabling you to control desires and escape sins. Seeing a prisoner being released in a dream is a good thing, and it means that some fears will be released and fears will go away. Dreaming of escaping from prison while dogs are chasing you means that you are being chased by enemies and envious people. The interpretation of seeing a prisoner behind bars, unjustly imprisoned, means that he is being subjected to severe cruelty by those around you. Dreaming of getting out of prison: Seeing a prisoner outside his prison, either escaping or leaving, is a good sign. This indicates success in disciplining the soul from what harms it, as well as superiority over the accused soul and the evil soul that commands it to distance itself. From the path of truth, this is one of the most difficult challenges that a person goes through, and this is a sign of his success in overcoming himself. Interpretation of a dream about a prisoner for a married woman: seeing a prisoner outside the prison and that prisoner was your husband, then this vision has clear connotations, so if your husband is already imprisoned and you see him in a dream and he is His appearance is beautiful and pleasant, which means that he will soon be acquitted, and this is a promising vision that her husband is right and that the accusations against him are false. Interpretation of a dream about imprisoning a person: If he dreams that he is imprisoned for matters related to religion, this indicates the faith of that person. To dream that the ruler Putting you in prison means that you will be affected by anxiety and resentment. To dream of a married man means a husband with a harsh temper that will make his life hell. It indicates silence, hiding secrets and secrets that you know nothing about. Interpretation of seeing a prisoner: If the person is sick, then prison is the grave. It indicates poverty. Extreme poverty, destitution, and the need of people. Al-Nabulsi said that it is a sign of meeting loved ones after a long absence. If the dreamer is in good health and does not suffer from problems, this means long life. Interpretation of a dream about prison in a dream. Contemporary psychologists argue that prison means the individual feels extreme discomfort. The interpretation is no different. The dream of prison is about the prisoner or the ordinary man, as both of them feel anxious and stressed. Interpretation of seeing a prisoner is an indication of extreme loneliness. Introverted or depressed people have these dreams often. Prison in a dream means your feeling of loneliness and symbolizes the psychological prison within you. Interpretation of dreams of visiting a prisoner, if one of them Imprisoned and dreaming that a loved one goes to visit him, this is good news for you. This means that you will be acquitted and will actually obtain your freedom from prison, or it means that you will be released early for reasons such as good behavior and conduct. Seeing someone you love imprisoned in a dream indicates a vision beyond the passage. This person is going through a difficult time but is trying to hide his sadness and anxiety from the people around him. The vision appears Also, he is a deceitful and hypocritical person, and he is unfaithful to his loved ones and is trying to appear in front of people. The vision in the dream symbolizes an unmarried person. The evil man will appear as he is after falling into his trap. The previous vision also heralds the marriage of an unmarried woman to someone she loves and will do a lot to make her happy. The dream also indicates the loneliness that the dreamer suffers from and the feeling that Others don't care about him. This vision is a message

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about golden bracelets for a woman married to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing gold bracelets in a dream for a married woman: There is no doubt that seeing gold is loved by many women, but this vision among jurists is the subject of great controversy, as there is hatred on the one hand and desire on the other. Bracelets, taking them off, stealing them, or wearing them. What concerns us in this article is that we take a look at all the specific cases and signals of a dream about golden bracelets for a married woman. Learn about the interpretation of a dream about golden bracelets for a married woman from Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about golden bracelets for a married woman. Seeing gold expresses well-being, prosperity, and wealth. And thought, emotional, psychological, natural and spiritual state, personal beliefs, traditions, decorations and burials. Seeing golden bracelets in a dream for a married woman is a sign of kindness, special ambition, many wishes and hopes, constant anticipation and complete preparation, thinking about tomorrow’s matters, paying attention to every detail, setting priorities and arranging them first. This vision also indicates the gains and benefits that insight enjoys, the responsibilities and duties assigned to it, and the powers it enjoys that enable it to reach all stages and reach its goal and what it hopes for. And if he sees that he is wearing the bracelet, it symbolizes status, elevation, good fatherhood, and the source from which Wisdom, experience, and the various sources from which food is harvested are derived from it, and the situation changes dramatically. The bracelet expresses the constant fluctuations, movements, and permanent disturbances in life, problems and crises that require acumen and flexibility in dealing with them, and the need to quickly adapt to all current variables. This vision can indicate On the assignment of a task or the existence of a plan that the viewer aims to benefit from in the long term, or the beginning of the implementation of a project that he expects to benefit from in the future. Interpretation of a dream about golden bracelets by Ibn Sirin in a dream Ibn Sirin went on to say: Gold is abhorrent to sight, in terms of its pronunciation and meaning, as Seeing him expresses loss, contradiction and loss. This vision also indicates bad speech, distortion of hearing, slander, deterioration of taste, status and dealings, and entering into experiences that will result in disappointment, anguish and extreme sadness. If the lady sees the bracelets, this indicates the captive and the chains that bind her. And it prevents her from moving forward in her life, and the worries and psychological and nervous pressures that prevent her from reaching her goal. As for the vision of golden bracelets, this vision expresses the profits that you make, the money that you earn, the inheritance that you benefit from, and you will have a large share of it, and the bounties that God bestows. To them without expectation or return. Seeing silver bracelets is better than gold, based on the interpretation that silver is better than gold, and symbolizes strife, alienation, severe dissatisfaction, and many conflicts. But if the lady sees two bracelets, one of silver and the other of gold, this indicates confusion, hesitation, and dispersion. And evil and hatred in her life. If silver is better than gold, then...

title: Interpretation of a dream about eating fried eggs

preview.html: But under the circumstances, and through this article, we will show you everything related to seeing fried eggs according to the circumstances and conditions of this dream, and here it is. Interpretation of seeing fried eggs in a dream for one girl: If an unmarried girl sees that she is eating fried eggs and another person is eating fried eggs from the same plate. It indicates marriage to that person. While fried eggs are dreamed in the dream of an unmarried girl. A sign of achieving goals and ambitions related to the vision. What if he sees that he buys eggs from the market, and takes them home in a dream. It is a sign of food arriving in his waking life. That Dreaming of eating delicious fried eggs in the dream of an unmarried girl, indicates the success that comes with a great livelihood. Seeing eating fried eggs, and their taste is bad in the dream of an unmarried girl, can symbolize bad news, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. And seeing a single girl enjoying the taste of Fried eggs in a dream indicate the success of business, thanks to God Almighty. See also: Interpretation of a dream about collecting eggs from under a chicken. Interpretation of seeing fried eggs in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman sees in a dream that she is frying eggs. It means goodness and blessing that will enter her home, God willing. And if a woman sees For a married woman in a dream that she is eating fried eggs, this is a sign of the happiness that prevails in her home in reality. Either a dream of eating fried eggs and their taste is unpleasant, or a bad taste in a married woman’s dream. A sign of some of the many problems of marriage, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. It was said that he sees fried eggs with a bad taste. It is wonderful that a married woman feels during her sleep. It means sustenance and blessing that prevails in her home. While the dream of eating eggs with the husband in a married woman’s dream indicates the understanding that prevails in the place. Perhaps seeing burnt eggs in a married woman’s dream indicates an unfavorable vision, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of seeing fried eggs in a dream about a man and its meaning. The meaning of fried eggs in a married man’s dream falls under the meaning of pursuing ambitions and increasing livelihood. But if a married man sees himself eating fried eggs in a dream. It is a new job that will bring him a lot of money and blessings, according to what he sees from The number of eggs. And if he saw that he was buying eggs from the market, and the number of eggs was exciting in the dream. This is a huge blessing and a lot of money for him and his family. Seeing a lot of fried eggs in a married man’s dream indicates marital happiness and many children. Seeing eating fried eggs with others Some people in a married person’s dream symbolizes happiness and sharing, meaning that the person who sees the dream is characterized by sharing and social communication. And the meaning of the interpretation of seeing fried eggs with bad taste in a married man’s dream. Its meaning is an unfavorable vision, and God is the Most High, All-Knowing. And if a married man sees that he is eating Fried eggs with his children and wife in a dream. It is a sign of the family bond and happiness that resides in the home. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about eating or peeling boiled eggs and its meaning. The meaning of seeing fried eggs in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. If a pregnant woman eats fried eggs in

title: Interpretation of seeing sewers in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing sewage in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing sewage in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is committing sins. As you can see, draining cockroaches and insects, this is evidence that there are people in the dreamer’s life who hold him with hatred and malice. Also, when you kill sewage insects in a dream, this is evidence of getting rid of adversity, problems, hypocrites, and the dreamer’s enemies. And he will distance himself from them. Interpretation of dreams Drain to drainIn the dream this is evidence of evil and witchcraft as well as envy, and the dreamer is exposed to harm. But if the dreamer dreams that he is passing through a drain, this is a sign of overcoming difficulties and achieving the goals he pursues. Also while observing the sewage has grown and overflowed in the house This is a strong indication of trouble, sadness, anxiety, and sadness. As for a clogged drain in a dream, it is evidence of abundant sustenance and kindness to the dreamer and his family. But seeing a drain has many meanings, as it could be an honorable or immoral woman, or it could be a bad and harmful woman. Interpretation of sewage. Drinkable In a dream, this is evidence of a serious illness, as well as illegal money and illegal ways to obtain money. A married woman dreamed of the presence of a sewer in a dream. A married woman watches the sewer, this indicates the presence of multiple problems, anxiety, sadness, and a feeling of unhappiness. We will see a sewer in the dream indicates This indicates feelings of sadness and many crises with the partner. As for the overflow of drains in the house, this is evidence of distress, poverty, and the accumulation of debts to the husband, and a feeling of illness and fatigue. As for the smell of sewage in the dream, this is evidence of illegal, immoral, and unfair behavior, and God knows best. We will see escaping from the sewage, and this is evidence of Promotion at work and satisfying desires for success and success. Seeing a child falling into the drain in a dream. Seeing a child falling into the drain is evidence that the dreamer will be exposed to a severe ordeal, and God knows best. The interpretation of seeing a child falling into the sewer in a dream is evidence that he is talking aggressively and about the symptoms of others, gossiping and gossip about The fortune teller.Seeing a child A small child falling into the sewer in a dream, and this is evidence that he has gone through difficult circumstances in the coming days. Interpretation of seeing a skin rash in sewage in a dream. I see sewage in a dream, it is considered a bad dream, as well as a sign of illness, poverty, distress, problems and crises. As for Seeing sewers in a dream is evidence of committing sins, and God knows best. Whereas seeing sewers in a dream means the loss of a relative or death. Also, the rays of sewers in a dream are evidence of the end of problems and freedom from crises and difficulties. I dreamed that I fell into the sewers in a dream. When you see a man falling In the drain in a dream, this is a sign that he is involved in quarrels, fears, anxiety, and problems. But if a married woman dreams that she is falling into the sewer, this indicates that she is going through a very difficult and difficult phase in her life. Likewise, seeing someone falling into the sewer is evidence of the presence of friends. Bad people degrade the dreamer. When you see single If one falls into a sewer in a dream, then...

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about cancer by Ibn Sirin?  Interpretation of a dream about cancer and interpretation of a dream about cancer for a close person

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about cancer: Cancer is a frightening disease because it has serious consequences on a person’s health, which may cost him his life, and it is possible for someone to see in his dream that he is infected or that it has been taken from a family member. Their loved ones. And we will explain to you what is the interpretation of a dream about cancer? Interpretation of a dream about cancer by Ibn SirinInterpretation of a dream about cancer A dream about cancer is considered one of the disturbing things for the dreamer, who feels extreme fear of the repercussions it brings upon him, and many experts expect this dream to have good and bad aspects according to some circumstances and things. Contained in it. The interpretation of dreams about cancer explains that the dreamer will not suffer from a severe disease or it will not affect his health in his life, especially those fatal diseases for which a person will pay with his life, and God knows best. Some believe that if cancer affects the chest and the dreamer sees it, this means his intense love For goodness and his efforts to reconcile people, along with many of his good qualities. A group of interpretation scholars came and explained that there is some unhappiness that can arise from this dream because it highlights distress and a large number of bad feelings that can threaten a person’s life and make him suffer from psychological illnesses. If a person has a tense relationship with his family or friends and sees this dream, it is confirmation of this problem and he must focus on some decisions that improve things and do not falter and cause him stress. There are possibilities that indicate that a dream about cancer requires good health maintenance, especially if it is in the lung. This indicates that the person neglects his body and fails to follow the healthy habits that strengthen it. From here it becomes clear to us that there are different points of view related to this vision, and the many interpretations that have entered into it, and therefore we must focus on each scene and its meaning in order to interpret it in the best possible way. Interpretation of a dream Cancer by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin confirms that while watching this dream, the dreamer must think carefully about all aspects of his life, because there are some things that are unbalanced and require effort, while he may be concerned with other useless matters. There is another prediction by the scholar Ibn Sirin in a dream about this disease. , which is the presence of false and deceitful people in the dreamer’s area, but he treats them with spontaneity and honesty, and they do not deserve it in reality. If you see that you have been diagnosed with cancer, it can be said that your personality brings some problems and consequences to your family and always makes them confused because of your actions, and you should be Be careful and focused on your interactions to stop these judgments. You may be a very suspicious person and always look behind the people close to you to find out if someone is cheating on you. As a result, it appears in your dream that you have cancer and you should be careful because there is a lot of doubt that it can lead to serious consequences. The Dream Interpretation section contains On an Egyptian site from Google, there are many interpretations and questions from fans that you can see. title: Interpretation of seeing the color blue in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: In the following paragraphs, we present to you the interpretation of the color blue in a dream for a single woman, according to the interpretation of the great scholar Ibn Sirin. Comfort for its owner. Sometimes one girl sees this color in her sleep and does not know the meaning of this vision. And what does it indicate, so you have to turn to dream interpreters to interpret what was seen. Her dream, and the jurists said that this dream generally has a good connotation, but its connotations differ depending on the state of the color that the unmarried girl sees, and therefore we will explain to you in the following lines of the encyclopedia the most important of them from what the scholar Ibn Sirin and dream interpretation scholars presented in his interpretation of seeing the color blue in a single woman’s dream. Blue color in a single woman's dreamDream interpretation scholars believe that if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is wearing a blue dress and the design of the dress is calm and beautiful, then this is a good vision that shows the calmness and good psychological state that the dreamer has. It passes, passes, passes successfully. This vision also suggests a stable and trouble-free life and that the dreamer enjoys vitality and activity in her life. Seeing the color blue in an unmarried girl’s dream means that the dreaming girl thinks a lot about money and seeks to accumulate it and work in the field of sales. Purchasing is for the purpose of financial gain. One of the most important things that interpretation scholars have also said is that the color blue in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates that she will travel to obtain money and that God will provide her with sustenance and blessed sustenance. This vision may indicate happy events in the girl’s life and that she will enter into a profitable job or She succeeds in the field of study. Also, the color blue in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates her high status among people and she will get a great promotion in her work. The blue color in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The respected scholar Ibn Sirin believes that seeing the color blue in a dream is a praiseworthy vision, which indicates That the dreamer will achieve his dreams and aspirations in life. Scientists disagreed with Muhammad Ibn Sirin regarding the interpretation of seeing wearing blue clothes in a dream. Ibn Sirin said that the blue dress indicates the coming of problems, while interpretation scholars said that this dream cannot be generalized, as the blue dress may sometimes indicate a stable life free of problems. Blue shoes in a dream for a single woman. Dream interpretation scholars say that if an unmarried girl sees shoes Blue in her dream, this is a sign that she will marry a religious man with a calm and beautiful nature and she will live a stable life with him without worries and sorrows. May God Almighty make her happy with her husband. Seeing blue shoes in an unmarried girl’s dream may indicate promotion and a prestigious job or success and excellence in studies. Interpretation of the color indigo in a dream. The color indigo in a dream shows purity of heart and purity of spirit and shows love, affection and familiarity. Seeing the color indigo in a dream, Or wearing clothes dyed in this color, indicates psychological stability and peace, as well as the stability of the sleeper’s condition in his relationship with his family and relatives. Interpretation of a dream about a long blue dress for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is wearing a dress

title: Interpretation of putting nails in a dream and removing nails in a dream

preview.html: Seeing artificial nails for a single woman, according to Ibn Sirin, according to Imam Al-Sadiq, for married women, for pregnant women, long, short, colored, broken, beautiful. If you dream that you are wearing nails, this portends a happy occasion soon. It may also be good news that you may hear soon. If you encounter this dream often, It may be a good sign that you need to make some changes in your life. If you dream that you are biting your nails, this means that you are suffering from a problem that is difficult to solve. If your nails are long in a dream, this means that you will defeat your enemies in reality. If you dream that your nails are chipped , it means that you will most likely lose money or health. If you see that you are putting nail polish on your nails in a dream, this means that you need to focus more, and pay more attention to what you are doing at this time. If you see your nails dirty in the dream, this indicates Negligence and laziness: For anyone who sees during his sleep that he is pulling his nails, this is a clear sign that he will go through serious experiences on the family or emotional level. Pulling out a nail in a merchant or businessman’s dream can symbolize a major financial loss or lack of success in achieving excellence and the loss of many deals. And important projects. Among the meanings that the dream of removing nails carries, we mention that it indicates corruption, betrayal of trust, and betrayal of those close to them, whether on the part of the dreamer or on the part of those close to the dreamer. If the latter sees that someone is pulling his claws, this is a sign that someone will betray him. If he sees himself taking off his nails, this is a sign that he will abandon his honesty and good behavior. If the nail is long when the dreamer sees that he is taking it out, this indicates his loss of his position or professional or social status. It may indicate the victory of enemies over the dreamer. However, if the nail was short when it was removed, this is an indication that he will maintain his position and protect himself from enemies without defeating them. Seeing the nails coming out in a dream could indicate the death of a person or relative, or even the death of the dreamer himself. Whoever sees in his dream that he is removing the nails of one of his close patients. This is a sign of his death. And whoever is sick and dreams of pulling out his nails, this is a sign of his death. Dream of nails - YouTube

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing corpses in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing corpses in a dream: Seeing corpses and corpses of the dead in a dream explains many bad changes that occur in the dreamer’s life during this period, and the vision may portend the death of a loved one or a great experience and sadness, just as the dreamer was immersed in material and psychological crises. As a result of this vision, in some places, dream scholars believe that the corpses and dead people in their dreams are nothing but a divorce for a married woman, a delay in pregnancy, and serious problems faced by an unmarried girl that may delay her marriage. A large number of bodies in a dream gives a man negative feelings, great loneliness, fear of the future, and a strange body in the dream that is different from the person he knows. Interpretation of seeing corpses in a dream by Ibn Sirin: A corpse in a dream indicates disturbances and turmoil. There may be serious family problems at the point of fighting and rivalries, it may indicate the loss of friends, death or serious illness. Many corpses indicate quarrels that may lead to murder and destruction, and corpses in the sea indicate disobedience, lack of religion or disbelief in the death of the Pharaoh who drowned and the unbelievers died. And also the son of our master Noah, who said that. Asmni was a flat mountain, it died in the flood. The presence of a large number of corpses carrying a coffin in a dream portends big problems and worries with family and friends, and perhaps seeing a dead person in inappropriate clothing in a dream indicates bad visions indicating the death of a loved one. A corpse portends Heavy in a dream with difficulties in study or work, major academic failure, and the death of a person in a dream and seeing it in the form of a physical warning about difficult problems and financial crises that he is already going through. Seeing the bodies of martyrs in a dream. Whoever saw witnesses in a dream, this indicates that the insight will follow the same path as this one. The witness or those witnesses, and he may have received testimony like them, but some misfortunes and he will face some difficulties in his life. Seeing dead children in a dreamIf corpses terrify the soul, then the corpses of children are more afraid than adults, because the child is loved by everyone, and seeing him in the ugliest form or Torn parts of the body will be a stressful image for the soul. In dreams it may indicate sad memories of a person who has a vision or excessive fear of dying children, and this may indicate the death of childhood within that person who has the vision, because every human being has a childhood age in him. His.Interpretation of seeing corpses in a dream for a single woman. There is no doubt that seeing dismembered remains in a dream, whether human or animal, is frightening and frightening. What we see in reality is imprinted in the memory and comes in the form of dreams and visions. It can be a warning or a sermon and an insight that must be Of being careful and praising God for good and evil, and everything is God’s destiny and will. Between the chapter. And a nun. Interpretation of seeing corpses in a dream for a married woman. Seeing torn parts of the body in a dream means misfortunes and disasters, loss of values ​​and principles, continuity of trust, with remains, useless human remains, as well as a person without worthless values, morals and principles. Seeing corpses in the sea is interpreted to see corpses. And

title: Interpretation of brother in a dream Meaning of seeing brother in a dream

preview.html: We explain to you the dream of a brother and the vision of brothers for an unmarried girl and a pregnant woman, on the authority of Ibn Sirin, killing a brother or his death, contacting a dead brother, beating a brother or marriage. Interpretation of the meaning of a brother in a dream: A brother in a dream sometimes refers to the brother of the person who is really dreaming, and the big one indicates the father. And the opposite is not true, that is, the father in a dream does not indicate a son. A brother may see in a dream his brother, grandfather, maternal uncle, or someone who has a share in the inheritance, and all of this indicates his job of sharing or helping with money. Perhaps they were pointing to each other as well. This vision has a good meaning, as it indicates that brothers stand by each other in the event of distress that one of them suffers from, especially in financial transactions. And the person who sees in his dream that his brother or sister is happy and happy in the dream, then this vision It shows the happiness and money that a brother or both of them can meet in reality. Seeing a brother in a dream is pregnant. Whoever sees her brother or sister in a dream, the vision indicates that she is about to give birth to a boy. If you see in your dreams your brothers full of life, then you will find a reason to rejoice in your wealth or their wealth. If Were they poor and in need, or asking for help, you will soon be called to a dying bed or suffer a painful loss. A brother’s journey in a dream indicates the dreamer’s journey and his marriage may indicate a diet that the dreamer will receive. A new baby that a brother gives birth to in a dream could be happy news. The dreamer receives it. If you see your brother wearing new clothes in a dream, this means a positive change that will happen to you in the future. A quarrel with a brother in a dream symbolizes the love that unites him with his brother, as well as differences. This interpretation is incorrect if there are actually differences between them related to inheritance, housing, money, or something. Such a brother’s illness in a dream can symbolize the dreamer’s problems and fears, while his death in a dream is an expression of longevity, if this death is not accompanied by a dark funeral or some form of sadness and crying. Burying a brother in a dream can symbolize estrangement or Strife. The good that comes to the brother in a dream is usually good for the dreamer himself. Bad and hateful events, such as illness or road and traffic accidents, are all considered psychological problems that the dreamer goes through, but most of them are fleeting and do not leave a bad effect at all. The interpretation of a dream about the death of the Akhmut brother in a dream indicates On the death of enemies, that is, their death and defeat in front of you, whatever problems you face, and therefore the dream will be good for you. If you are sick and see a dead brother in a dream, this indicates your recovery from the illness. If you see that your brother dies in a dream and is not buried, this means That he will defeat his enemies. Death in a dream may be a journey for your brother and it may be a wedding for a single person. The death of a brother may also indicate remorse for a great sin for which your conscience rebukes you. If you accompany your brother during his death in a dream, it means a long journey. If you see your deceased brother holding With your hand, it means that you will receive an amount of money from a hopeless party.If
